txt.en: 'Tra lilly la! I dance when I drink! But the Elves won't dance with me....'\n\nWhat a disgrace. You should make sure Páll gets out of sight before the Elves start getting offended by his public display of drunkenness.
Designated Escort: A Disturbance in Celondim
A member of the Ale Association seems to have landed drunk in Celondim, where all the Elves can see him. Shameful!
Now Páll can sleep it off without embarrassing his neighbours
You left Páll to make a fool of himself
At least he is out of sight now.

Páll, a stranger who wandered down from Thrási's Lodge, is the disgrace of Celondim.\n\nYou should escort the drunken dwarf to a secluded place where he won't be disturbing the good-mannered Elves around town.
Escort the drunken dwarf out of this public place
